variant.description: The visual style of the link.
variant.name: variant

isQuiet.description: Whether the link should be displayed with a quiet style.
isQuiet.name: isQuiet

isExternal.description: Whether the link should open in a new tab.
isExternal.name: isExternal

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.
slot.name: slot

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.
style.name: style

onPress.description: Handler that is called when the press is released over the target.
onPress.name: onPress

onPressStart.description: Handler that is called when a press interaction starts.
onPressStart.name: onPressStart

onPressEnd.description:
Handler that is called when a press interaction ends, either
over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.
onPressEnd.name: onPressEnd

onPressChange.description: Handler that is called when the press state changes.
onPressChange.name: onPressChange

onPressUp.description:
Handler that is called when a press is released over the target, regardless of
whether it started on the target or not.
onPressUp.name: onPressUp

autoFocus.description: Whether the element should receive focus on render.
autoFocus.name: autoFocus

onFocus.description: Handler that is called when the element receives focus.
onFocus.name: onFocus

onBlur.description: Handler that is called when the element loses focus.
onBlur.name: onBlur

onFocusChange.description: Handler that is called when the element's focus status changes.
onFocusChange.name: onFocusChange

onKeyDown.description: Handler that is called when a key is pressed.
onKeyDown.name: onKeyDown

onKeyUp.description: Handler that is called when a key is released.
onKeyUp.name: onKeyUp

href.description: A URL to link to. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#href).
href.name: href

hrefLang.description: Hints at the human language of the linked URL. See[MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#hreflang).
hrefLang.name: hrefLang

target.description: The target window for the link. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#target).
target.name: target

rel.description: The relationship between the linked resource and the current page. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel).
rel.name: rel

download.description: Causes the browser to download the linked URL. A string may be provided to suggest a file name. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#download).
download.name: download

ping.description: A space-separated list of URLs to ping when the link is followed. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#ping).
ping.name: ping

referrerPolicy.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#referrerpolicy).
referrerPolicy.name: referrerPolicy

routerOptions.description: Options for the configured client side router.
routerOptions.name: routerOptions

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.
aria-label.name: aria-label

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.
aria-labelledby.name: aria-labelledby

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.
aria-describedby.name: aria-describedby

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.
aria-details.name: aria-details

onHoverStart.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction starts.
onHoverStart.name: onHoverStart

onHoverEnd.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction ends.
onHoverEnd.name: onHoverEnd

onHoverChange.description: Handler that is called when the hover state changes.
onHoverChange.name: onHoverChange

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.
children.name: children

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.
className.name: className

variant.name: variant

isQuiet.name: isQuiet

isExternal.description: Whether the link should open in a new tab.

rel.name: rel

download.description: Causes the browser to download the linked URL. A string may be provided to suggest a file name. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#download).
download.name: download

ping.description: A space-separated list of URLs to ping when the link is followed. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#ping).
ping.name: ping

referrerPolicy.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#referrerpolicy).
referrerPolicy.name: referrerPolicy

routerOptions.name: routerOptions

children.name: children

className.name: className
